DataElement.preferredName: Lansky Play-Performance Status Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that indicates the patient meets the eligibility requirements for participation in a clinical trial with regards to the lansky-play performance status.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Lansky Play-Performance Status Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The play-performance scale for children is a parent-rated instrument which records usual play activity as the index of performance.  It is similar to the Karnofsky Performance Scale for adults.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The play-performance scale for children is a parent-rated instrument which records usual play activity as the index of performance.  It is similar to the Karnofsky Permormance Scale for adults.

Concepts.definition: The play-performance scale for children is a parent-rated instrument which records usual play activity as the index of performance.  It is similar to the Karnofsky Performance Scale for adults.

Property.preferredDefinition: Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.administrativeNotes: 2023.5.31 Released. ak 2023.3.8 Created per ticket request CADSR0002119. ak

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, Unknown, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 requested By Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership  transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/23/16 jk value "Not evaluable" added in error by COG on 3/21/16 was removed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were eligibility requirements met for participation in a clinical trial with regards to the lansky-play performance status?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: For patient greater than or equal to 12 months of age, is the performance status by Lansky Scale greater than or equal to 50%?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a Lansky performance score of greater than or equal to 50?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient meet Eligibility Criteria corresponding to Lansky play-performance status score?
